elements.title: Answer the questions on the subject of delayed delivery.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What is a dunning transaction?
elements.correctAnswer: In a reminder transaction, no exact delivery date is agreed because it is not so important to the buyer when exactly the goods will be delivered.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What can buyers do if a delivery does not arrive despite a grace period?
elements.correctAnswer: You have three options to choose from: (1) Insist on subsequent delivery and claim damages for delay. (2) Waive subsequent delivery and claim damages for non-delivery. (3) Withdraw from the contract. The buyers waive delivery and can only claim compensation for expenses.

elements.name: Anweisung2
elements.title: Answer the questions on the subject of delayed delivery.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: How do you turn a dunning transaction into a fixed transaction?
elements.correctAnswer: If an item does not arrive by the requested deadline in the case of a dunning transaction, the buyer must set the seller a reasonable grace period. This grace period converts the dunning transaction into a fixed-date transaction.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Which products can lead to a fixed transaction?
elements.correctAnswer: Examples: Wedding dress, food for a party, flowers for a birthday, flyers for an event, etc.
